title: Iota Point
description: Randy and Tania Kaplan had the ideal life. Remarkable emerging careers with wonderful income streams assuring a high quality of life. Then, the allure of Iota Point entered their lives. Everything changed at that moment. The long struggle that ensues causes Randy to reassess his priorities about life. In this precious story reflecting the silent challenges of thousands of people, the important things about life and relationships are identified.
author: Louis H. Campbell
